evidence.text: Regex search for 'monitor' yielded no matches related to court-ordered monitor reports. All references to 'monitor' were in context of research safety protocols (e.g., 'clinical monitoring', 'safety monitoring'), not court-supervised compliance reports.

Regex search for 'monitor' across all 15 documents yielded 5 matches, all referring to general research monitoring (e.g., 'safety monitoring during and after doxycycline dosing', 'clinical monitoring') rather than a court-appointed monitor. No document mentions a court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor.
